name: biomni-retrieve-topk-repurposing-drugs-from-disease-txgnn
title: Biomni: Retrieve Topk Repurposing Drugs From Disease Txgnn
description: Predicts top K drug repurposing candidates for a given disease using TxGNN
content:
Overview

Predicts top K drug repurposing candidates for a given disease using TxGNN (Therapeutic Graph Neural Network). Leverages knowledge graphs to identify existing drugs with potential therapeutic efficacy for new indications.

Input Parameters

  • disease_name (required): Name of disease or condition for repurposing analysis
  • data_lake_path (required): Path to TxGNN knowledge graph database
  • k (optional): Number of top drug candidates to return (default: 5)

Input Format

{
  "disease_name": "Alzheimer's Disease",
  "data_lake_path": "/path/to/txgnn_database",
  "k": 10
}

Biological Use Case

Accelerates drug repurposing by identifying FDA-approved drugs with potential efficacy for new indications. Reduces development costs and timelines by leveraging existing safety data. Particularly valuable for rare diseases and conditions lacking effective treatments. Supports computational drug discovery and precision medicine initiatives.

Output

Ranked list of repurposing candidates with predicted efficacy scores, mechanistic rationale, existing approvals, and supporting evidence saved to drug_repurposing_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
